title: Gemstone Blocks
summaries: Gemstone Blocks are types of blocks which are naturally generated in the Underground and Cavern layers. When mined, they drop one of their respective gems. They can be mined by any pickaxe or drill, or destroyed by explosives.
On the [img:Desktop version] Desktop, [img:Console version] Console, and [img:Mobile version] Mobile versions, they can also be crafted at a Heavy Work Bench in the Graveyard Mini-Biome.

statistics.Sell: 1
